Package org.apache.wayang.core.plan.executionplan

Class ExecutionTask

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.plan.executionplan.ExecutionTask
public class ExecutionTask extends Object
Serves as an adapter to include ExecutionOperators, which are usually parts of WayangPlans, in ExecutionPlans.
